settings.label: Date limit
settings.info: Badge appears if product was created within this many days

settings.label: Message
settings.info: Use ||amount|| to display progress towards free shipping.
settings.default: You are ||amount|| away from free shipping.

settings.label: Success Message
settings.default: Congratulations! Your order qualifies for free shipping

settings.label: Minimum spend for free shipping
settings.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters. [More info](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/free-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value)

settings.label: Message
settings.info: Use ||amount|| to display progress towards free gift.
settings.default: You're ||amount|| away from a FREE gift.

settings.label: Success Message
settings.default: Congratulations! Your order qualifies for free gift.

settings.label: Minimum spend for free gift
settings.info: Use round numbers. Exclude currency, symbols, and letters. [More info](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shipping/setting-up-and-managing-your-shipping/free-shipping-rates#free-shipping-over-a-certain-value)
